AlreadyDepreciated.name: AlreadyDepreciated
AlreadyDepreciated.description: Indicates if an asset was already depreciated before registering it in Exact Online

AssetFrom.name: AssetFrom
AssetFrom.description: In case of a transfer or a split, the original asset ID is saved in this field. This is done to provide tracability of the Asset

AssetGroup.name: AssetGroup
AssetGroup.description: Asset group identifies GLAccounts to be used for Asset transactions

CatalogueValue.name: CatalogueValue
CatalogueValue.description: The catalogue value of the asset

CommercialBuildingValues.name: CommercialBuildingValues
CommercialBuildingValues.description: Commercial building value. You can have several commercial building value, with start and end dates

Costcenter.name: Costcenter
Costcenter.description: Assets can be linked to a cost center

Costunit.name: Costunit
Costunit.description: Assets can be linked to a cost unit

DeductionPercentage.name: DeductionPercentage
DeductionPercentage.description: Used for Belgium legislation. Used to produce the official 'Investment deduction' report

DepreciatedAmount.name: DepreciatedAmount
DepreciatedAmount.description: Amount that is already depreciated when adding an existing asset. Can only be filled when 'Alreadydepreciated' is on

DepreciatedPeriods.name: DepreciatedPeriods
DepreciatedPeriods.description: Number of periods that already have been depreciated for the asset. Can only be filled when 'Alreadydepreciated' is on

DepreciatedStartDate.name: DepreciatedStartDate
DepreciatedStartDate.description: StartDate of depreciating. Can only be filled when 'Alreadydepreciated' is on

Description.name: Description
Description.description: This is the description of the Asset

EndDate.name: EndDate
EndDate.description: Asset EndDate is filled when asset is Sold or Inactive

EngineEmission.name: EngineEmission
EngineEmission.description: Engine emission of the asset, needed to calculate the co² report

EngineType.name: EngineType
EngineType.description: Engine type of the asset, Needed to generate a co² report

GLTransactionLine.name: GLTransactionLine
GLTransactionLine.description: Links to the gltransactions.id. GL transaction line based on which the asset is created

InvestmentAmountDC.name: InvestmentAmountDC
InvestmentAmountDC.description: Investment amount in the default currency of the company

InvestmentAmountFC.name: InvestmentAmountFC
InvestmentAmountFC.description: Investment value of the asset. Currently the field is filled with the PurchasePriceLocal. Can be status 'Not used' after sources have been cleaned

InvestmentCurrency.name: InvestmentCurrency
InvestmentCurrency.description: Indicates the currency of the investment amount

InvestmentDate.name: InvestmentDate
InvestmentDate.description: Refers to the original date when the asset was bought

InvestmentDeduction.name: InvestmentDeduction
InvestmentDeduction.description: Belgian functionality, to determine how a local legal report regarding investment deduction must be created

PrimaryMethod.name: PrimaryMethod
PrimaryMethod.description: First method of depreciation. Currently, it is the only one used

ResidualValue.name: ResidualValue
ResidualValue.description: Indicates the residual value of the asset at the end of the depreciation

Status.name: Status
Status.description: Identifies the status of the Asset. (1 = Active, 2 = Not validated, 3 = Inactive, 4 = Depreciated, 5 = Blocked, 6 = Sold)

TransactionEntryID.name: TransactionEntryID
TransactionEntryID.description: Reference to the transaction lines that make up the financial entry.

Type.name: Type
Type.description: Indicate if an asset is commercial building or other asset. (0 = Other Assets, 1 = Commercial Building)

endpoint_info.good_to_know: Use this endpoint to get all information related to your admininstrations asset master data. This REST API returns the information as seen on the asset card.To retrieve the total depreciated amount and the last depreciation date as calculated in Exact Online, you must use XML API.
